name: Maruzen Ramen Kit
desc:
Each Maruzen Ramen Kit contains: 
 300g Ramen Noodles Pasta 
 150g Ramen Paste 
 Nori Sheets

name: Fukuoka Strong Taste Ramen Kit
desc:
Each Fukuoka Strong Taste Ramen Kit contains:
Nori Sheets 
Ramen Noodles 
It is good for 6 to 8 servings too! 
Add exciting toppings like chasu, egg, chili, etc!

name: Tonkotsu Ramen Kit
desc:
Each Tonkotsu Ramen Kit contains:
150g Ramen Paste
300g Ramen Noodles
Nori Sheets
